heroes.name: Clancy
heroes.trait: Unicorns - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Unicorns or War Unicorns for each level attained after 6th level

heroes.name: Ivor
heroes.trait: Elves - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Wood Elves or Grand Elves for each level attained after 3th level

heroes.name: Kyrre
heroes.trait: Logistics - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Logistics skill percentage

heroes.name: Mephala
heroes.trait: Armorer - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Armorer skill percentage

heroes.name: Ryland
heroes.trait: Eagle Eye - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage

heroes.name: Thorgrim
heroes.trait: Resistance - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Resistance skill percentage

heroes.name: Ufretin
heroes.trait: Dwarves - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Dwarves or Battle Dwarves for each level attained after 2nd level

heroes.name: Aeris
heroes.trait: Pegasi - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Pegasi or Silver Pegasi for each level attained after 4th level

heroes.name: Alagar
heroes.trait: Ice Bolt - Casts Ice Bolt with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Coronius
heroes.trait: Slayer - Casts Slayer with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Elleshar
heroes.trait: Intelligence - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Intelligence skill percentage

heroes.name: Gem
heroes.trait: First Aid - Receives a 5% per level bonus to First Aid skill

heroes.name: Malcom
heroes.trait: Eagle Eye - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage

heroes.name: Melodia
heroes.trait: Fortune - Casts Fortune with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Uland
heroes.trait: Cure - Casts Cure with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)
